accomplishments.summary: Unified siloed global marketing teams by creating and implementing a standardized data governance framework for a $20M annual marketing spend. Owned the project end-to-end, from gathering cross-functional requirements to configuring the utm.io platform and leading the change management, training, and onboarding for over 200 stakeholders, ultimately boosting platform adoption by 150% and reducing data inconsistencies by 30%.

Resolved team inefficiency by designing and implementing a new engagement model and automated intake process for the Global Marketing Analytics team. Partnered with PMO, business, and technical stakeholders to replace an ad-hoc system with a streamlined Jira/Smartsheet workflow, reducing the request lifecycle from 2 weeks to 3 days and freeing up engineering resources from chasing requirements.

Owned the Invoca call intelligence platform to provide sales performance and customer sentiment insights. Partnered with Invoca's data science team to co-develop and train proprietary NLP models, using confusion matrix testing to achieve 90% classification accuracy. Drove the strategy to integrate this data into closed-loop reporting and ad platforms (Google Ads) to optimize marketing spend.

Served as the central operational leader for a 40-member Global Marketing Analytics team, orchestrating work across four verticals (Data Strategy, QA, Data Engineering, BI). Owned the team's backlog, managed resource allocation, and aligned execution with leadership's strategic priorities for a $20M marketing spend, increasing overall team efficiency by 30%.

Led the project to migrate the 200+ user Global Marketing Confluence instance into the enterprise SSO environment. Owned the end-to-end process, including the seamless migration of 100GB+ of data, user training, and administration, completing the project ahead of schedule with zero disruption to user access or permissions.

As co-founder, drove the end-to-end product discovery and strategy for an AI-driven event planning platform to create a one-stop-shop for event planners using 3D modeling and AI. Conducted 15+ user interviews and 10+ surveys to create foundational artifacts (personas, journey maps, JTBD), defined the product roadmap, and owned the prioritized engineering backlog.

Oversaw the integration of Hugging Face (GenAI) and Pinterest APIs to build a core AI design recommendation engine. Drove the technical execution and launched the feature to 10+ beta customers, establishing a rapid feedback loop for continuous improvement and mentoring junior team members on Agile practices.

Enabled a nimble startup team to thrive in a fluid environment with constantly changing requirements by introducing Agile (Scrum) practices. Acted as Scrum Master, coaching the team on using iterative development and continuous feedback to increase the speed of value delivery to customers.

Led a 7-phase global program to modernize Akamai's tax automation by migrating from Oracle EBTax to Thomson Reuters OneSource, impacting $1B in annual spend. Owned the full SDLC, from learning and configuring the new SaaS platform to translating complex international tax laws into technical requirements (BRDs, FRDs, Process Flows) and managing the complex integration with Oracle EBS, delivering $4M in efficiency savings.

Drove a complex, SOX-compliant expense system modernization by integrating SAP Concur, Amex, and the AppZen AI compliance engine with Oracle EBS. Led the migration of 20+ operational reports to Cognos BI (learning it from scratch) and implemented the AppZen ML model to automate 99% of compliance checks, improving on-time reporting by 20%.

Automated the transmission of $1B in annual vendor payments by designing and leading the implementation of a highly available (99.99% success rate) host-to-host XML system with banking partners (Chase, Citi). Authored all technical documentation (BRD, FRD, TDD, BR100) and managed the full SDLC, including regulatory dependencies and UAT with external banks.

Increased cross-functional operational efficiency by 25% by owning the Procure-to-Pay modules in Oracle EBS. Partnered with DevOps on root cause analysis and used SQL-based analysis to drive data-driven prioritization, balancing the business backlog against critical technical debt. Created Tableau dashboards to give leadership visibility, enabling the successful delivery of multiple large-scale projects while improving operational stability.
